titleStmt.title: The characters or pourtraicts of the present court of France wherein is described the king, the princes, the generals and the principal ministers of state &c. / written originally in French ; made English by J.B., Gent.
Divers portraits. English
titleStmt.author: Montpensier, Anne-Marie-Louise d'Orléans, duchesse de, 1627-1693.
Bulteel, John, fl. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Thomas Palmer ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Anne-Marie-Louise, duchesse de Montpensier; the translation is doubtfully ascribed to John Bulteel. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
